SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.ClientModel

Class ClientCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.ClientModel.ClientCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClientCard extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a client-side card in the game, including its unique identifier, graphical user interface (GUI) sprites, and text user interface (TUI) sprites. This class is used to display the card's appearance and relevant details to the player.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • ID

      public final int ID
      A unique card identifier to facilitate the card's retrieval.

    • GUI_SPRITES

      public final Map<Side,String> GUI_SPRITES
      A map of the card's image resources path, keyed by side. This is used for the graphical display of the card in the user interface.

    • TUI_SPRITES

      public final Map<Side,ArrayList<ArrayList<Triplet<String,Integer[],Integer>>>> TUI_SPRITES
      A map representing the card's appearance in the TUI (Text User Interface) view. Each card side is visualized through two entries, each corresponding to one side of the card. The external list represents the rows of the card (in this project, each card has 5 rows). Each row contains a list of triplets, where each triplet represents a visual segment of the row.

      The triplet consists of: - A string: typically a character (either a space or a printable character). - An array of integers: representing the foreground and background color codes. - An integer: indicating the length for which this visual pattern should be repeated.

      For example, if a row in a card consists entirely of the same character and color, the length will reflect the number of characters to be displayed on the screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientCard

      public ClientCard(int id, Map<Side,String> guiSprites, Map<Side,ArrayList<ArrayList<Triplet<String,Integer[],Integer>>>> tuiSprites)
      Constructs a new ClientCard with the specified ID, GUI sprites, and TUI sprites.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for this card
      guiSprites - a map of the card's GUI sprites
      tuiSprites - a map of the card's TUI sprites
